name: Neon Drifter
description:
Here comes the challenging one... The atmospheric drift neon-themed game.

Neon Drifter - is exciting and beautiful game where player can show their dexterity in drift skills. 

Pleasant music and neon stylization create an unique atmosphere, which makes the process of passing quite uncommon. Try on the role of mysterious neon drifter, avoiding obstacles in a controlled drift, but watch the fuel level in the tank! 

The game has 30 different levels, in which you need to collect all the points until the car runs out of gas. The faster the level is completed, the more neon drifter will get stars. All levels are open for passing from the start, as even the most famous drifters had to try to pass some. Can you accept the challenge?
